title: Did anyone else's seating info change?

comments.body:
It does change, dw
Make sure you go to the new terminal, if any confusions check the attendance form in the room

Your seating allotment *can* change within a single ISA (and ESA too). It is not uncommon. Always remember to double-check your seating allotment before the exam. There have also been multiple incidents of it getting updated a few hours before an exam, so the recommendation is always to check 30 mins before an exam as well.
wait can it change even after the seating info has come for the exam the previous night?

How will it change *during* the exam lmao. What are you, Schrodinger's cat?

But yes, sometimes the seating allotment goes through changes and usually gets fixed only an hour or so before the exam. That's why - always keep checking and make one final check 15 mins before the exam.
the results are gonna be like schrodingers cat :>
